column2: Dark Tower: The Drawing of the Three - Lady of Shadows (2015) #3
column6: ODETTA HOLMES' CHAPTER IN STEPHEN KING'S DARK FANTASY EPIC CONTINUES! Odetta Holmes is left vulnerable and in a coma after her attempted murder - and her assassin, Jack Mort, is still on the hunt! Trapped in a dream state, Odetta struggles to find answers...from none other than ROLAND, THE GUNSLINGER! And the hatred-fueled DETTA WALKER makes her unforgettable entrance!
column8: | writer:Peter David | writer:Robin Furth | penciller (cover):Nimit Malavia | artist:Jonathan Marks
